description: doc: refer to http://build.golang.org/ where applicable

messages.text:
Well, the link that says "Build and benchmark status" isn't quite accurate anymore. No benchmarks there. Andrew may want to wait, or have that text changed. On Wed, Dec 21, 2011 at 7:00 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > > > Description: > doc: refer to http://build.golang.org/ where applicable > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5501062/ > > Affected files: > M doc/contrib.html > M doc/devel/index.html > M doc/root.html > > > Index: doc/contrib.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/doc/contrib.html > +++ b/doc/contrib.html > @@ -41,7 +41,7 @@ > >

The Go Project

> > -

Build > Status

> +

Build > Status

>

View the status of Go builds across the supported operating > systems and architectures.

> > Index: doc/devel/index.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/doc/devel/index.html > +++ b/doc/devel/index.html > @@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ >
  • Roadmap
    • >
  • Release history
    • >
  • Weekly snapshot history
    • > -
  • Build > and benchmark status
    • > +
  • Build and benchmark > status
    • > >
      >
    • **Contributing code
      • > Index: doc/root.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/doc/root.html > +++ b/doc/root.html > @@ -90,7 +90,7 @@ >
        >
      • Package > Dashboard
        • >
      • Issue > Tracker
        • > -
      • Build > Status
        • > +
      • Build > Status
        • >
      • Go > Source [changes]**
        • >
      • Package Reference
        • >
      • **Language > Specification
        • > > >

LGTM

We'll mention benchmarks again when there are benchmarks.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b16a53f58594 ***

On 2011/12/22 03:07:16, bradfitz wrote:
> Well, the link that says "Build and benchmark status" isn't quite accurate
> anymore.  No benchmarks there.
> 
> Andrew may want to wait, or have that text changed.

Thanks for the review!

The text has been shortened to "Build status".  It seemed easier than adding benchmarks to the dashboard.

subject: code review 5501062: doc: refer to http://build.golang.org/ where applicable
